source.query:
SELECT 
    au.id,
    COALESCE(sket_en.name, '') AS name_en,
    COALESCE(sket_en.recipe, '') AS recipe_en,
    au.calories,
    au.cuisine_id,
    CASE WHEN regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') <> '' 
         THEN CAST(regexp_replace(au.servings, '\D*(\d+).*', '\1') AS INTEGER)
         ELSE 0 
    END AS servings,
    au.updated_at,
    au.visible AS is_visible,
    au.created_at,
    COALESCE(sket_en.description, '') AS description_en,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.name, '') AS name_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.recipe, '') AS recipe_ar,
    COALESCE(sket_ar.description, '') AS description_ar,
    1 AS country_id,
    '' AS cuisines_banner_image_url,
    '' AS recipe_banner_image_url,
    '' AS app_home_image_url,
    0 AS position
FROM 
    spree_kitchen_recipes au
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_en ON (sket_en.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_en.locale = 'en')
LEFT JOIN 
    spree_kitchen_recipe_translations sket_ar ON (sket_ar.spree_kitchen_recipe_id = au.id AND sket_ar.locale = 'ar');

select 
	id,
	user_id,
	category_id as store_credit_category_id,
	type_id as 	store_credit_type_id,
	created_by_id,
	amount,
	amount_used,
	amount_authorized,
	currency,
	LEFT(memo,200) as memo,
	invalidated_at,
	expires_at,
	created_at,
	updated_at,
	deleted_at
From spree_store_credits;

select
	id,
	name,
	available_to_admin,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_categories

select
	id,
	store_credit_id,
	action,
	amount,
	user_total_amount,
	authorization_code,
	update_reason_id,
	originator_type,
	originator_id,
	currency,
	COALESCE(created_at,current_timestamp) as created_at,
	COALESCE(updated_at,current_timestamp) as updated_at
From spree_store_credit_events;

select
	id,
	name,
	priority,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_types;

select
	id,
	name,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_update_reasons;

SELECT
  id AS super_market_id,
  payment_id,
  delivery_option_id
FROM (
  SELECT
    id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*home_delivery:(.*)$', '\1'), 'store_pick_up:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '1' AS delivery_option_id -- Home Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    id AS super_market_id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*store_pick_up:(.*)$', '\1'), 'home_delivery:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '2' AS delivery_option_id -- Store Pickup Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'
) AS subquery_alias
ORDER BY super_market_id;

select
   ds.id,
   dst.name,
	concat(dst.address1,' ',dst.address2) as address,
    LEFT(COALESCE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ds.phone, '+966', ''), '+973', ''), ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
   ds.country_id,
   ds.created_at,
   ds.state_id,
   lower(dst.city) as city,
   ds.updated_at,
   ds.visible as is_visible,
   ds.latitude,
   ds.longitude,
   ds.time_slots_schedule_time_offset_override AS time_slots_lead_time,
   ds.express_fee AS express_delivery_fee,
   ds.call_masking as call_mask,
   ds.min_item_total_for_free_delivery as minimum_total_amount_for_free_delivery,
   COALESCE(dst.description, '') as description
from danube_supermarkets ds
left join danube_supermarket_translations dst on dst.danube_supermarket_id =ds.id and dst.locale='en'
order by ds.id;

SELECT
  id AS supermarket_id, 
  2 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'

UNION

SELECT
  id,
  1 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%';

SELECT
    supermarket_id,
    2 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
        SELECT
            ('[' || string_agg(format('[%s,%s]', coordinate->1, coordinate->0), ',') || ']')::json
        FROM (
            SELECT json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(coverage)::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    ST_X(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_longitude,
    ST_Y(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM
    danube_express_supermarkets;

WITH collected_geometries AS (
    SELECT 
        szm.zone_id,
        ST_ASText(sd.region) AS geom,
	AVG(ST_X(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_longitude,
        AVG(ST_Y(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_latitude,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by zone_id order by zone_id) as row_num
	
    FROM 
        spree_districts sd
    JOIN 
        spree_zone_members szm ON sd.id = szm.zoneable_id
    WHERE 
        sd.visible = true
    GROUP BY 
        szm.zone_id, sd.region
), filtered_geometries AS(
SELECT zone_id,geom,center_longitude,center_latitude
FROM collected_geometries
where row_num = 1)
SELECT 
    coalesce(ds.id) AS supermarket_id,
    1 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
        SELECT 
            json_agg(coordinate) 
        FROM (
            SELECT 
                json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_GeometryN(cg.geom,1))::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    cg.center_longitude,
    cg.center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM 
    spree_zones sz
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_supermarkets ds ON sz.id = ds.zone_id AND ds.supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_express')
LEFT JOIN 
    filtered_geometries cg ON sz.id = cg.zone_id
where geom is not null
and ds.id is not null;

select * from (SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      1 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_and_express')
  UNION
  SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      2 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('express', 'regular_and_express')) as ds order by supermarket_id asc;

SELECT 
	  REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
-- 	  UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(MAX(spt.supplier_name), ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) as code,
	  LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
	  MAX(spt.created_at) as created_at,
	  MAX(spt.updated_at) as updated_at,
	  MAX(spt.deleted_at) as deleted_at
	FROM 
	  (SELECT
		spree_product_id,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) as code,
		MAX(created_at) as created_at,
		MAX(updated_at) as updated_at,
		MAX(deleted_at) as deleted_at
	  FROM spree_product_translations
	  WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
	  GROUP BY spree_product_id) as spt
	GROUP BY spt.code;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dtss.time_slot_id) AS id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id AS delivery_option_id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday' 
        ELSE '' 
    END AS day_of_week, 
    CAST(dts.start_time AS TEXT) AS start_time, 
    CAST(dts.end_time AS TEXT) AS end_time, 
    dts.enabled AS is_enabled, 
    1 AS country_id 
FROM 
    danube_time_slots_schedules dtss 
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_time_slots dts ON dtss.time_slot_id = dts.id 
GROUP BY 
    dtss.time_slot_id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id, 
    dtss.day_of_week, 
    dts.start_time, 
    dts.end_time, 
    dts.enabled;

with cte as
(SELECT
  u.id,
  CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  u.email,
  'others' as gender,
  COALESCE(CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),'') AS country_code,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  cast(u.dob as Text) as dob ,
  COALESCE(u.referral_code, '') AS referral_code,
  CASE WHEN u.locale ='en' THEN 1
	ELSE 2
   END AS language_id,
  a.city,
  a.latitude,
  a.longitude,
--   when country_id is '0' updated as '1' 
  CASE
    WHEN a.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE a.country_id
  END AS country_id,
  True as receive_marketing_promotions,
  case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	0 as balance,
	u.blacklisted_at,
	u.blacklisted_reason,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by u.id order by sua.updated_at desc) as rn

FROM spree_users u
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses ua ON u.id = ua.user_id AND ua.default = TRUE
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses a ON ua.address_id = a.id
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id 
ORDER BY u.id ASC)

select id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, gender, country_code, mobile_number, dob, referral_code, language_id, city,
	latitude, longitude, country_id, receive_marketing_promotions, login_type, social_id, balance, blacklisted_at, blacklisted_reason
	from cte 
	where rn = 1;

select 
    id,
    product_id,
    barcode,
    created_at,
    updated_at
from spree_product_barcodes 
Order by id ASC;

SELECT id,
       viewable_id          AS product_id,
       attachment_file_name AS file_name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       1 as order
FROM   spree_assets
WHERE  viewable_type = 'Spree::Variant' 
Order by id ASC;

WITH Cte AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    sp.id,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.name END), '') AS name_en,
    MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.description END) AS description_en,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'ar' THEN spt.name END), '') AS name_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'ar' THEN spt.description END) AS description_ar,
    UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(MAX(CASE WHEN spt.locale = 'en' THEN spt.name END), ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) AS code,
    sp.expires_at,
    sp.starts_at,
    COALESCE(sp.usage_limit, 0) AS usage_limit,
    sp.match_policy,
    sp.created_at,
    sp.updated_at,
    sp.per_code_usage_limit,
    sp.apply_automatically,
    sp.deleted_at,
    TRUE AS is_visible
  FROM spree_promotions AS sp
  LEFT JOIN spree_promotion_translations AS spt ON spt.spree_promotion_id = sp.id
  WHERE spt.name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY sp.id
  ORDER BY sp.id ASC
)
SELECT
  id,
  name_en,
  description_en,
  name_ar,
  description_ar,
  code,
  expires_at,
  starts_at,
  usage_limit,
  match_policy,
  created_at,
  updated_at,
  per_code_usage_limit,
  apply_automatically,
  deleted_at,
  is_visible
FROM (
  SELECT
    id,
    name_en,
    description_en,
    name_ar,
    description_ar,
    code,
    expires_at,
    starts_at,
    usage_limit,
    match_policy,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    per_code_usage_limit,
    apply_automatically,
    deleted_at,
    is_visible,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY name_en ORDER BY id) AS rn
  FROM Cte
) AS temp
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY name_en;

SELECT
    st.id,
    st.parent_id AS parent_id,
    st.position,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) as name,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink,
    st.taxonomy_id,
    st.created_at,
    st.updated_at,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords,
    st.visible,
    Date(st.start_time) AS start_date,
    Cast( Substring(To_char(st.start_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)  AS text) AS start_time,
    Date(st.end_time) AS end_date,
    Cast(Substring(To_char(st.end_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS text) AS end_time,
    st.product_text_tag_en,
    st.product_text_tag_ar,
    COALESCE(st.tag_to_show, '') AS tag_to_show,
    st.visible_only_for_subscriber,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) as name_ar,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords_ar,
    '' as pretty_name,
    '' as pretty_name_ar,
    'false' as featured
FROM
    spree_taxons st
LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt on stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
GROUP BY
    st.id;

SELECT 
    a.taxon_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN au.name = 'Danube' THEN (SELECT id FROM spree_countries WHERE name = 'Saudi Arabia')
        ELSE aua.id 
    END AS country_id
FROM spree_tenants_taxons a
LEFT JOIN spree_tenants au ON a.tenant_id = au.id
LEFT JOIN spree_countries aua ON aua.name = au.name;
